abstract: Air conditioner repair and installation services in New York City metropolitan area typically experience uptick in demand during heat waves like one region is experiencing now; job is made more difficult due to fact that it often requires that they work in attics, which is usually hottest area of house.
lead_paragraph: Workers shuffling around in attics to install a new system or repair an old one have had no escape from this week’s high temperatures and oppressive humidity.

headline.main: No Respite From the Heat for Air-Conditioning Installers
headline.print_headline: Fighting Attic Heat to Restore the Cold

snippet: Workers shuffling around in attics to install a new system or repair an old one have had no escape from this week’s high temperatures and oppressive humidity.
